item.title: The Good Wife
item.series: Season 4, Ep. 21: A More Perfect Union
item.description: Alicia's case involving at-will employees trying to unionize sparks a possible mutiny at Lockhart Gardner. Meanwhile, Peter gives Alicia an opportunity to renew their wedding vows, but he also needs her help on the campaign.

shorttext.p: Season 4, Ep. 21: A More Perfect Union

Alicia's case involving at-will employees trying to unionize sparks a possible mutiny at Lockhart Gardner. Meanwhile, Peter gives Alicia an opportunity to renew their wedding vows, but he also needs her help on the campaign.

item.title: House of Cards
item.description: Francis resorts to informal negotiations with a Chinese billionaire. Lucas takes extreme measures in use to reveal the vice president. Team Underwood gets a new member. Meanwhile, Stamper gets closer to Rachel.

shorttext.p: Francis resorts to informal negotiations with a Chinese billionaire. Lucas takes extreme measures in use to reveal the vice president. Team Underwood gets a new member. Meanwhile, Stamper gets closer to Rachel.

item.title: Gotham
item.description: A new recruit in Captain Sarah Essen's Gotham City Police Department, Detective James Gordon is paired with Harvey Bullock to solve one of Gotham's most high-profile cases ever: the murder of Thomas and Martha Wayne.

shorttext.p: A new recruit in Captain Sarah Essen's Gotham City Police Department, Detective James Gordon is paired with Harvey Bullock to solve one of Gotham's most high-profile cases ever: the murder of Thomas and Martha Wayne.

item.title: Breaking Bad
item.description: Walt's world crumbles even more when he finds out that Skyler is cheating on him. Jesse tries to set up a meeting with Gus to try and sell his own version of the blue meth. Meanwhile, Hank is growing obsessed with finding Heisenberg.

shorttext.p: Walt's world crumbles even more when he finds out that Skyler is cheating on him. Jesse tries to set up a meeting with Gus to try and sell his own version of the blue meth. Meanwhile, Hank is growing obsessed with finding Heisenberg.

item.title: Tyrant
item.description: On the verge of betraying and displacing Jamal, Barry receives troublesome news that threatens to destroy everything he's worked so hard for. Jamal's rising suspicions lead him to question the loyalty of those closest to him.

shorttext.p: On the verge of betraying and displacing Jamal, Barry receives troublesome news that threatens to destroy everything he's worked so hard for. Jamal's rising suspicions lead him to question the loyalty of those closest to him.

item.title: Partners
item.description: When Marcus hires a recently paroled ex-convict to work in the office, Allen suspects the once-criminal to have ulterior motives. As Allen helps Ruth draw up a living will, Marcus grows jealous of his partner bonding with his mother.

shorttext.p: When Marcus hires a recently paroled ex-convict to work in the office, Allen suspects the once-criminal to have ulterior motives. As Allen helps Ruth draw up a living will, Marcus grows jealous of his partner bonding with his mother.

item.title: Orange Is the New Black
item.series: Season 2, Ep. 11: It Was the Change
item.description: The prison guards finally crack down on the inmates to stop the smuggling issue. Tensions run high as a prison power outage forces several issues to come to light; Piper finds herself compromised and is forced to think on her feet.

shorttext.p: Season 2, Ep. 11: It Was the Change

The prison guards finally crack down on the inmates to stop the smuggling issue. Tensions run high as a prison power outage forces several issues to come to light; Piper finds herself compromised and is forced to think on her feet.

item.title: The 100
item.description: Joy's baby daddy, Simon (Craig Ferguson), meets his son and grandson for the very first time as they pretend to be a happy family to get Wilbur into a prestigious pre-school. Melanie and Elka try to find the perfect doctor.

shorttext.p: Joy's baby daddy, Simon (Craig Ferguson), meets his son and grandson for the very first time as they pretend to be a happy family to get Wilbur into a prestigious pre-school. Melanie and Elka try to find the perfect doctor.

item.title: Manhattan
item.series: Season 1, Ep. 1: The One You Love
item.description: Charlie Isaacs and his family arrive in Los Alamos and attempt to navigate a community built on secrets. Frank Winter, the head of the Manhattan Project, struggles with the sacrifices he is making to help the U.S. win World War II.

shorttext.p: Season 1, Ep. 1: The One You Love

Charlie Isaacs and his family arrive in Los Alamos and attempt to navigate a community built on secrets. Frank Winter, the head of the Manhattan Project, struggles with the sacrifices he is making to help the U.S. win World War II.

item.title: Game of Thrones
item.description: Tyrion is arrested for the murder of Joffery and awaits trial. Sansa escapes King's Landing. Sam sends Gilly to Mole's Town. The Night's Watch finds themselves in a tight spot. Meereen challenges Daenerys.

shorttext.p: Tyrion is arrested for the murder of Joffery and awaits trial. Sansa escapes King's Landing. Sam sends Gilly to Mole's Town. The Night's Watch finds themselves in a tight spot. Meereen challenges Daenerys.

item.title: Downton Abbey
item.description: Mary receives a letter from Matthew's effects, naming her as his sole heir and therefore the owner of half the estate. Encouraged by Violet, she agrees to shadow Tom and learn more about the running of Downton.

shorttext.p: Mary receives a letter from Matthew's effects, naming her as his sole heir and therefore the owner of half the estate. Encouraged by Violet, she agrees to shadow Tom and learn more about the running of Downton.

item.title: Breaking Bad
item.description: Hank asks Walt to drive him to the laundry where the meth lab is hidden. Ted still won't pay the IRS so Skyler asks Saul for help, and Saul sends in his A-Team. Gus and Jesse return from Mexico, and Walt fears he is in trouble with Gus.

shorttext.p: Hank asks Walt to drive him to the laundry where the meth lab is hidden. Ted still won't pay the IRS so Skyler asks Saul for help, and Saul sends in his A-Team. Gus and Jesse return from Mexico, and Walt fears he is in trouble with Gus.

item.title: Falling Skies
item.description: Tom uncovers confidential intelligence about the heart of the alien operation. Meanwhile, Charleston prepares to mount an offensive against the Espheni, but a massive explosion brings the operation to a halt.

shorttext.p: Tom uncovers confidential intelligence about the heart of the alien operation. Meanwhile, Charleston prepares to mount an offensive against the Espheni, but a massive explosion brings the operation to a halt.

item.description: The President meets with Jonas Hodges while Jack battles toxins in his body and works with someone inside the Starkwood compound: can they destroy the bio-weapons before rockets rain death on U.S. cities?

shorttext.p: The President meets with Jonas Hodges while Jack battles toxins in his body and works with someone inside the Starkwood compound: can they destroy the bio-weapons before rockets rain death on U.S. cities?

item.title: Haven
item.description: A series of exsanguinated bodies have the police at a loss to explain the deaths. Everyone is angry at Nathan for shooting Agent Howard and destroying the barn, but it would appear that some are more angry than others.

shorttext.p: A series of exsanguinated bodies have the police at a loss to explain the deaths. Everyone is angry at Nathan for shooting Agent Howard and destroying the barn, but it would appear that some are more angry than others.

item.title: The 100
item.description: Discovering that Jasper may still be alive, Clarke, Bellamy, Finn, Wells and Murphy make a pact and head out to find him. On the Ark, Abby is determined to prove Earth is habitable, and enlists a mechanic to craft an escape pod.

shorttext.p: Discovering that Jasper may still be alive, Clarke, Bellamy, Finn, Wells and Murphy make a pact and head out to find him. On the Ark, Abby is determined to prove Earth is habitable, and enlists a mechanic to craft an escape pod.

item.title: True Blood
item.description: Sarah is captured and kept prisoner at Fangtasia. Jason and Jessica feel Violet's wrath. Lettie Mae bids farewell to Tara, witnessing what Tara wanted her to. Through Sookie, Bill is made aware of the cure, but will he accept it?

shorttext.p: Sarah is captured and kept prisoner at Fangtasia. Jason and Jessica feel Violet's wrath. Lettie Mae bids farewell to Tara, witnessing what Tara wanted her to. Through Sookie, Bill is made aware of the cure, but will he accept it?

item.title: Vikings
item.description: The Wessex Viking raid is in full swing and King Ecbert finds himself facing an entirely new kind of foe. While Ragnar races to dominate in the West, Jarl Borg has his own plans in store for the future of Kattegat.

shorttext.p: The Wessex Viking raid is in full swing and King Ecbert finds himself facing an entirely new kind of foe. While Ragnar races to dominate in the West, Jarl Borg has his own plans in store for the future of Kattegat.

item.title: The Walking Dead
item.description: As the sick are quarantined, Daryl, Tyreese, Michonne and Bob leave the prison in search of medical supplies. Rick makes a shocking discovery. Rick and Carol go to a nearby town where they find two uninfected stragglers.

shorttext.p: As the sick are quarantined, Daryl, Tyreese, Michonne and Bob leave the prison in search of medical supplies. Rick makes a shocking discovery. Rick and Carol go to a nearby town where they find two uninfected stragglers.

item.title: Shameless
item.series: Season 3, Ep. 7: A Long Way from Home
item.description: Frank and Fiona go to extreme lengths in court to claim sole custody of the kids. While Hymie's family arrives to take their son from Sheila and Jody, while Fiona starts a new job and a new romance.

shorttext.p: Season 3, Ep. 7: A Long Way from Home
Frank and Fiona go to extreme lengths in court to claim sole custody of the kids. While Hymie's family arrives to take their son from Sheila and Jody, while Fiona starts a new job and a new romance.

item.title: Pretty Little Liars
item.description: With the events of New York behind them, the Liars are unsettled to still be living under a cloud of secrets. Aria is haunted by the recent past events, while Emily and Spencer try to wrap their head around the new normal.

shorttext.p: With the events of New York behind them, the Liars are unsettled to still be living under a cloud of secrets. Aria is haunted by the recent past events, while Emily and Spencer try to wrap their head around the new normal.

item.title: Agents of Shield
item.description: Dark secrets are revealed as Coulson and his team put everything on the line to stop Garrett and the forces of Hydra. Everyone tries to track down a former agent who is now stealing highly valuable information.

shorttext.p: Dark secrets are revealed as Coulson and his team put everything on the line to stop Garrett and the forces of Hydra. Everyone tries to track down a former agent who is now stealing highly valuable information.

item.title: Arrow
item.description: Peter Declan has been charged with murdering his wife, and only Oliver believes he's innocent. Arrow asks Laurel to look into Declan's case. Meanwhile, Walter investigates a warehouse that Moria mysteriously bought with the company's money.

shorttext.p: Peter Declan has been charged with murdering his wife, and only Oliver believes he's innocent. Arrow asks Laurel to look into Declan's case. Meanwhile, Walter investigates a warehouse that Moria mysteriously bought with the company's money.

item.title: Justified
item.description: Raylan is threatened by a mystery man at Charles Monroe's mansion, Boyd faces a surprise temptation while trying to figure out who stole his shipment, and cousin Daryl encourages Dewey to stand up to Boyd.

shorttext.p: Raylan is threatened by a mystery man at Charles Monroe's mansion, Boyd faces a surprise temptation while trying to figure out who stole his shipment, and cousin Daryl encourages Dewey to stand up to Boyd.

item.title: Pretty Little Liars
item.description: Shana tells Emily that she has a message from Ali, but can Emily and the girls trust Shana with all that they know about her? And when Shana ups the stakes and says that Ali wants to meet Emily could it all be part of it.

shorttext.p: Shana tells Emily that she has a message from Ali, but can Emily and the girls trust Shana with all that they know about her? And when Shana ups the stakes and says that Ali wants to meet Emily could it all be part of it.

item.title: Orange Is the New Black
item.description: After discovering a series of sad truths, friendships change. Tiffany Pennsatucky Doggett is offended by Piper Chapman, and that lead to the dangerous roads. Larry first meets Alex to cope with everything that is happening.

shorttext.p: After discovering a series of sad truths, friendships change. Tiffany Pennsatucky Doggett is offended by Piper Chapman, and that lead to the dangerous roads. Larry first meets Alex to cope with everything that is happening.

item.description: While the media interview the peace delegates, Jack and Cole have gone rogue to rescue a traitor being tortured by off-the-grid operatives; Logan gets President Taylor to approve putting his aide in charge of the manhunt.

shorttext.p: While the media interview the peace delegates, Jack and Cole have gone rogue to rescue a traitor being tortured by off-the-grid operatives; Logan gets President Taylor to approve putting his aide in charge of the manhunt.

item.title: Under the Dome
item.description: A friend of Julia's goes into labour after touching the dome. Big Jim kicks out Junior. Linda seeks out the Dundee brothers after Rose's murder. Joe and Norrie find a second mini-dome that holds a mysterious egg inside it.

shorttext.p: A friend of Julia's goes into labour after touching the dome. Big Jim kicks out Junior. Linda seeks out the Dundee brothers after Rose's murder. Joe and Norrie find a second mini-dome that holds a mysterious egg inside it.

item.title: Arrow
item.description: The mirakuru sends Roy into an uncontrollable rage and he unleashes on the city. Oliver realizes the mirakuru has taken over Roy completely and must figure out a way to stop him. Sara declares thatthe only way to stop him is to kill him.

shorttext.p: The mirakuru sends Roy into an uncontrollable rage and he unleashes on the city. Oliver realizes the mirakuru has taken over Roy completely and must figure out a way to stop him. Sara declares thatthe only way to stop him is to kill him.

item.title: Once Upon a Time
item.description: As Henry's life hangs in the balance, the race is on to stop Pan from gaining full power from the heart of the truest believer. Back in Storybrooke of the past, Regina decides to fill a void in her life and sets out to adopt a baby.

shorttext.p: As Henry's life hangs in the balance, the race is on to stop Pan from gaining full power from the heart of the truest believer. Back in Storybrooke of the past, Regina decides to fill a void in her life and sets out to adopt a baby.

item.title: Extant
item.description: Astronaut Molly Woods returns to Earth after a 13 month solo mission aboard a space station. She's re-adjusting to life with husband John and their child Ethan, a robot they call their own as Molly is unable to conceive.

shorttext.p: Astronaut Molly Woods returns to Earth after a 13 month solo mission aboard a space station. She's re-adjusting to life with husband John and their child Ethan, a robot they call their own as Molly is unable to conceive.

item.title: Strike Back
item.description: Section 20 tracks facilitator James Leatherby in Beirut. They continue to use Kamali in operations on Leatherby. Dalton is making bad decision due to her emotions over Baxter's death. Section 20 acts on tips about al-Zuhari.

shorttext.p: Section 20 tracks facilitator James Leatherby in Beirut. They continue to use Kamali in operations on Leatherby. Dalton is making bad decision due to her emotions over Baxter's death. Section 20 acts on tips about al-Zuhari.

item.description: Frank and Fiona go to extreme lengths in court to claim sole custody of the kids. While Hymie's family arrives to take their son from Sheila and Jody, while Fiona starts a new job and a new romance.
